name: Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate
description: Gain an immersive understanding of the practices and processes used by a junior or associate data analyst. Learn key analytical skills (data cleaning, analysis, & visualization) and tools (spreadsheets, SQL, R programming, Tableau).

name: IBM Data Science Professional Certificate
description: Master the tools of Data Science with this 10-course Professional Certificate from IBM. Learn Python, SQL, data analysis, and visualization, and build machine learning models.

name: Google IT Support Professional Certificate
description: Prepare for an entry-level role in IT support. Learn to perform day-to-day IT support tasks including computer assembly, wireless networking, installing programs, and customer service.

name: Bachelor of Business Information Technology (BBIT)
description: This degree programme prepares students to work in the dynamic IT environment by integrating business management with information technology. It covers programming, database systems, and business strategy.

name: Online MBA (USIU-Africa)
description: A flexible online MBA program designed for working professionals. Focuses on strategic management, entrepreneurship, and digital transformation in the African context.

name: Google AI Essentials
description: Learn how to use generative AI tools to help speed up daily tasks, make more informed decisions, and develop new ideas and content. No prior AI experience required.

name: IBM Cybersecurity Analyst Professional Certificate
description: Develop the knowledge and skills to enter the cybersecurity workforce. Learn about network security, threat intelligence, and compliance protocols.

name: Low-Code App Development
description: Learn to build and deploy enterprise-grade applications with minimal coding using the OutSystems low-code platform. Includes AI-assisted development features.

name: AI Fundamentals
description: A foundational course on Artificial Intelligence, covering key concepts, applications, and ethical considerations. Earn a verified digital credential from IBM.

name: Renewable Energy Technology Fundamentals
description: This specialization provides a foundation in renewable energy technologies. Learn about solar, wind, and storage systems and how to assess their economic viability.

name: Diploma in Renewable Energy
description: A hands-on diploma covering the installation, maintenance, and design of renewable energy systems. Focuses on solar PV, wind, and biomass technologies relevant to Kenya.

name: Master of Science in Sustainable Energy
description: An interdisciplinary program preparing students to lead the transition to sustainable energy. Curriculum covers engineering, economics, and policy.

name: Digital and Green Innovation Acceleration
description: An acceleration program for green and digital startups in East Africa. Provides mentorship, business modelling support, and access to investment networks.

name: Sustainability and Green IT
description: Learn about the principles of sustainability, green technologies, and how IT can be used to create a more sustainable future. Earn a verified digital credential.

name: Climate Smart Agriculture
description: A blended learning package designed for slow or no-connectivity environments, covering climate-smart agriculture, water management, and agribusiness models.

name: Bachelor of Science in Agriculture (Online)
description: A comprehensive degree program covering crop production, animal science, and agricultural economics. Blends theoretical knowledge with practical field attachment.

name: Smart Farming Technologies
description: Learn about digital tools for agriculture, including weather apps, market price platforms, and farm management software. Designed for extension agents and progressive farmers.

name: Digital Agriculture Africa (DAA) Program
description: A program focused on scaling digital solutions for agriculture. Trainings cover data privacy, user-centered design for farmers, and business models for agritech.

name: dSkills@EA - Digital Skills for East African Industry
description: A regional initiative to strengthen digital skills in East Africa. Offers training in digital marketing, e-commerce, and industry 4.0 applications for agribusiness.

name: Master of Science in Electrical and Computer Engineering
description: A world-class graduate program in engineering with a focus on African challenges. Covers AI, software systems, and telecommunications infrastructure.

name: Full Stack Development
description: An intensive coding bootcamp in Kinshasa. Students learn HTML, CSS, JS, React, and Node.js through project-based learning and peer programming.

name: East Africa Skills for Transformation (EASTRIP)
description: World Bank funded flagship TVET institutes across East Africa specializing in energy, manufacturing, and transport. Focus on competency-based education and training (CBET).

name: Coursera Platform
description: Global online learning platform offering courses, certificates, and degrees from top universities and companies.

name: edX Platform
description: Access university-level courses in computer science, engineering, and more from institutions like MIT and Harvard.

name: freeCodeCamp
description: Learn to code for free. Build projects and earn certifications in Responsive Web Design, JavaScript, and more.

name: Kaggle Learn
description: Practical data science and ML skills. Micro-courses designed to get you started with coding and data analysis quickly.

name: Microsoft Learn
description: Technical documentation and learning paths for Microsoft technologies, including Azure cloud and AI.

name: AWS Skill Builder
description: Digital training from AWS experts. Build cloud skills with 600+ free courses and interactive labs.

name: Cisco Networking Academy
description: Global IT and cybersecurity education program that partners with learning institutions to empower people with career skills.

name: FAO eLearning Academy
description: Free multilingual courses on thematic areas including food and nutrition security, social and economic development, and sustainable management of natural resources.

name: GOGLA Investment Academy
description: Specialized training for companies in the off-grid solar sector to improve their investment readiness and financial management.

name: Moringa School
description: A multi-disciplinary learning-accelerator committed to closing the skills gap in Africa's job market by providing high-potential tech talent with the skills they need.

name: Safaricom Talent Cloud
description: A platform connecting Kenyan talent with training and freelance opportunities. Focuses on in-demand digital skills.

name: Ajira Digital
description: A government initiative to empower over one million young people to access digital job opportunities. Offers free training and mentorship.

name: Certified Drone Pilot (RPL)
description: Remote Pilot License (RPL) required for commercial drone operations. Covers air law, flight planning, and practical flight tests. Standard: Civil Aviation Regs.

name: Solar T1/T2 License
description: Regulatory license for solar PV technicians. T1 covers small systems, T2 covers medium systems. Requires passing a NITA/EPRA exam. Standard: National Energy Regs.

name: Professional Data Engineer
description: Professional certification for data engineers. Validates ability to design, build, and operationalize data processing systems. Standard: Industry Cert.

name: Digital Extension Services
description: Certification in digital extension methods for agriculture. Standard: Global GAP / FAO.

name: Field Data Collection & Advisory Comm.
description: Micro-credential for field agents. Aligned to: CDACC Agri-Extension Lvl 4.

name: Customer Handover & After-Sales Support
description: Unit of Competency: Solar T2 Curriculum. Focuses on educating customers on system usage and safety.

name: Workplace Docs & Responsible Data Handling
description: Verifiable via Credly / OpenBadges. Covers essential digital hygiene and documentation standards.

name: IBM SkillsBuild
description: Explore job roles, learning pathways, and earn digital credentials.

name: Andela Learning Community
description: Join a community of learners with curated programs and mentorship.

name: Fuzu
description: Career coaching, learning content, and job opportunities.

name: Solar Energy International (SEI)
description: Practical solar training (Design/Install/O&M).

name: CORE Academy
description: DRE/Mini-grid practitioner certification.

name: RES4Africa Academy
description: Capacity building for renewable energy professionals.

name: RENAC Online
description: Green energy & climate finance training.

name: Bachelor of Science in Agriculture
description: A premier degree program in the region focusing on sustainable agriculture, rural development, and agricultural research.

name: BSc in Horticulture

name: Advanced Diploma in Crop Production
description: Hands-on technical training in modern crop production techniques and farm mechanization.

name: Certificate in Entrepreneurial Agriculture

name: Bachelor of Science in Agriculture
description: Focuses on agricultural challenges in arid and semi-arid environments.

name: Diplôme d'Ingénieur Agronome

name: BSc in Natural Resources & Environmental Studies

name: MSc in Renewable Energy

name: BSc in Mechanical Engineering (Energy Stream)

name: BSc in Energy Engineering

name: Solar PV Training (T3)

name: BSc in Computer Science

name: BSc (Hons) in Computer Science
description: Project-based degree program emphasizing leadership and mission-driven technology solutions.

name: ALX Software Engineering

name: National Diploma in Crop Production

name: MSc in Food Security
description: Advanced research degree addressing food security challenges in the region.

name: Solar Systems Installation Level 1

name: Biogas Masonry Training
description: Practical training on constructing domestic biogas plants.

name: Azure Data Fundamentals
description: Foundational knowledge of core data concepts and how they are implemented using Microsoft Azure data services.

name: Meta Back-End Developer
description: Launch your career as a back-end developer. Build portfolio-ready projects and learn Python, Django, and SQL.

description: Workshops and labs for corporate and startup innovation using data and digital tools.

description: Postgraduate research and training in sustainable energy solutions.
